name: The Arena (FyreStorm Studios)
description:
Choose from 3 classes and jump into The Arena!

Meant to be for the entertainment of the Royals and the wealthy, you are pitted into a fight to the death. Each class has its own perks and abilities, while infinite bullets keep you firing for as long as you possibly can. The more danger you are in, the more entertaining you are.

How high of a score can you get?
